name: Castles board game
description:
Castles Board Game is a tile-based board game for two to four players.

In the game, players build a map by placing castle, road or church tiles. Points are scored by placing 'peasants' on the tiles. The player with the highest score at the end wins.

You can play this game against real people (pass and play or online) or against a 'computer' player. The game is automatically saved when you close the app, so it is easy to resume when you open the app the next time.

Features:
- Local Multiplayer
- Computer players
